author: callan grogan
comment: I have a Pinterest addiction for real!! Lol I go on Pinterest probably 3-4 times a day either looking for new hair and makeup ideas, or looking for new products to go buy! I can always find what I'm looking for and I'm so happy that something like Pinterest exists because every other app that is similar isn't anywhere near as good as this app!!!!! If I could give it a million stars I would!!! ❤️💙💚💛💜

author: Katherine M Massa
comment: Scince the last update, I've hated the way it alters the newsfeed with ads and uninteresting stuff that I didn't asked. And the pins opens without even touching the screen: why? Not cool, ok. SLOWEST (thanks to f* ads) and annoying. The help center suggestions doesn't match the solution and the issue persist. USED TO love it, NOW I HATE IT. That's not how we liked it.

author: Ginger Gunter
comment: I rate Pinterest a actual 0 because when you go through the trouble of cleaning certain items out of boards. They still send people messages when item have been removed. And when you attempt to address the issue. Their help center definitely not helping the matter. And appearently Pinterest doesn't get rid of all of the copyright stamped photos that account holders post.

author: Ana Delevska
comment: The new update for the app is absolutely terrible. Particularly when I get messages/shared pins that are nowhere to be found in my inbox, then I have to start a new message to a particular person just so that it opens their message window and I can see what they've sent. My friends are experiencing the same issues when I send them something. Well done for ruining it guys.

author: Jasmine Hicks
comment: Freezes from trying to load. I don't like not knowing the number of pins on a board anymore. Crashes and kicks me out. And this is all since I updated 20mins ago. The last update was fine. I had no issue with that but now u ruined.it. please go back one update. And please take the ads and the picked for u out. I choose my boards for a reason I don't need extra suggestions. Thanks.                        Today is 10/20/16 I'm tired of pinterest kicking me off so I officially installed the app.  Thanks today is 3/3/18 they went back to the old way were I can see how many pins are in the board. N I love it. Now if u can minimize the suggestions and adds. I will be so happy thanks.

author: Zoe
comment: Pinterest honey what is with the new update. Commenting on anything is really frustrating and impossible now. Please fix commenting and stop updating random things like the icon of the explore page. Thank you I love the app but please stop.

author: Becky Keeth
comment: Was doing well with this site, until recently, every time I tried to use, it froze. I got some of my best recipes from this app, and still would like to explore what else is out there. If this matter can be resolved that would be great

author: God of games GR
comment: It is great and creative app, I learn a lot and I laugh a lot with the posts. A way to make it better is to fix the communication feature.(instant messaging) I won't recommend this app to message your friend but to share ideas is fantastic.

This app is actually very but good but because of the one reason I'm fed-up with this is that it send sooo many emails and when i want to unsubscribe from this service the webpage doesn't open. Plz do something pinterest to slove this problem

author: Susan Cain
comment: Short review huh? It would be impossible for me to sum up every thing I LUV about Pinterest in a short review!!! Ask anyone that uses Pinterest and you're bound to get one word...ADDICTIVE!!! I'm on my 5th phone and Pinterest is always one of the first 2 apps that I reinstall,it's that awesome! When doing a Google search you get a specific result or a zillion results but they are all about what you searched. With Pinterest,you may search shoes and before you know it,you end up on abandoned mansions..because of this,I've gained so much knowledge.

author: Missy nonyun
comment: I'm editing my review due to the fact I've had nothing but problems from this app for a week! I've done all the trouble shooting scenarios given on the Pinterest website. The pins won't load and half the time I can't see my saved ones. I'm tired of looking at color squares and nothing ever loading! Please fix this!!!....... I love this app! Love Pinterest! Just wish they would reorganize the boards like I have them on the PC. At least maybe alphabetical, instead of random.

author: Arielle Stone
comment: I tend to send my friends a lot of pins but recently after I send the first few I get "we could not complete that request" when I try sending more. It is really annoying because I can't send more pins then a very small amount in one day, when me and my friends like to send each other a ton of stuff otherwise this app deserves all five stars.... Please help/fix and I will change my rating to five stars.

author: Ry Boz
comment: I have used the app constantly for 3 years but I dislike the new comment system. It is still a good a app and easy to use but this new comment system wont let me see people's ideas. Now it crashes whenever I add a comment.

the app is not working on my samsung galaxy j1 ace phone. . it's just saying that something went wrong at their end. . i reinstalled it. bt still not working. plz tell me what's the problem or should i uninstall it? i liked the app. bt now i hate it

author: Q.R Edwardz
comment: I love the app but it keeps crashing and kicking me out. I'm getting sick of it. Please fix this asap, I haven't been able to fully stay on the app for a full five minutes in months.

author: M Jacobs
comment: I am an old customer to pinterest and now when I open the app there is sex pictures. Me as an Christian find it disgusting.!!!!!!
Hate that pinterest is now putting suggestions in my boards.  I really don't  need your intrusive help.

author: Labelle Luo
comment: Loved this app until it decides to only load 4 ideas at the first time, I can't scroll to get it to load more ideas unless I keep refreshing until I'm lucky enuff to get very long ideas enough for me to scroll down.

author: Spaticus Jean
comment: I like this app a lot, great way to keep ideas and  pages bookmarked. But too often the app won't show some of my pins or messages I get from some people.

author: Deborah Harley
comment: i love pinterest but theres a lot of spam. when you click on a topic quite often the link takes you to adverts. i like the ideas tho on the genuine sites.

author: Lys Skinner
comment: I hate that I'm forced to download this app every time I want to look at something on Pinterest. It's ridiculous! I won't use it enough to justify the wasted space, but I can't use a browser to look at things on Pinterest without being forced to the app.

author: Elise Longmuir
comment: 5 stars isn't enough for Pinterest, I would give it 10 if I could! :) I use it daily, for everything from recipes to kids crafts and DIYs! My favourite app by far! ♡

author: Tasmia Ferdous
comment: I love Pinterest , BUT it does not let me enter . I have tried reinstalling it but still does not work. Even if I try it on the PC , sometimes I can enter. I love Pinterest and I hate that I cannot see or enter it!!!
Im so addicted to so many things on Pintrest. Lots of ideas and so much more!

author: Kylla Lamboson
comment: Finally uninstalled. I was logged out of my account recently and so I wanted to log in but apparently there's no button to log in and only to sign up. What's the use of keeping an app that won't even let me log in to my existing account.

author: breezy fuller
comment: Every single time you guys do an update this app gets worse. Less is not more when it comes to features. Bring the comments back.

author: Dawn McCay
comment: I enjoy this place. I have found an amazing amount of home decor projects, recipies and ideas for the family. Keep up the great work.

author: Wiyan Wakan
comment: My whole family is addicted. Even the teenage son. If an idea is out there, its on Pinterest  and someone can show you how to do it.
I really enjoy this app and keep up the good work here!. I like the wide variety it has to offer it's users  !Thanks!

author: safeya kamel
comment: I hate this new update...  you made follow topics and can't unfollow them

author: tamar Cunningham
comment: I love this app! It's one of my favorites...EXCEPT the new update with the comments. Can you please fix this Pinterest? I love to go in and see recipes and what people thought of them. Now you switched it all up. Fix this and I'll give you 5 stars as long as you don't mess up something else in the process. Still my go to app for hair tips, decor ideas, recipes and so much more.
. So manygreat ideas. my favorite thing are allthe recipes those ideas t makeuptipS.

author: Carrie Hebert
comment: Pinterest is my only GO TO for inspiration, instructions, information, and relaxation. It's an everyday habit!

author: Silviu Halașag
comment: I love the app, but you need to check the latest update because in the messages section I can't see the last conversation due to the "new message" buton that you just implemented. It's just sitting over the last conversation.

author: S.A. Myers
comment: It was great until they added advertisements to the app. Organizing pins was easy and much appreciated, however once you move 50 pins, you cant move more to your subfolder boards from the phone app.

author: Ashish Mallick
comment: Login is a mess. Most of the time button wont work

author: aya alkhayat
comment: I like the app but after the new updates I can't read or leave comments. I hope they fix this soon

author: Carolyn Kerns
comment: I used this app for years costuming in theater! It's a perfect place for easy inspiration and research. I had a giant board of ideas without even trying. Love it!

author: J. Samantha Tan
comment: Pinterest is a great platform to find inspiration, useful tips and new tricks. Love love love it :)

author: bushra rizwan
comment: Please improve delete and move pin method its very frustrating to move or delete pins one by one... There should be select more than one option..
